title: Thinking It Through - function of pronoun

content.question: In paragraph 2, sentence 7 (“In philosophy … the issues”), the author repeats the pronoun “we” primarily to

choices.label: underscore the difference between those who can think critically and those who cannot
invite his audience to think of themselves as part of a specific disciplinary community
hint that the audience is prone to entertaining unexamined assumptions
suggest that everyone would benefit from taking a philosophical view on important issues

content.answer: invite his audience to think of themselves as part of a specific disciplinary community

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
